topics.body:
+My Dad:+ Goodbye, my family! I'll be back from Brazil in about a few days!
+Us:+ See ya, dad! Good luck and be safe!
+Puppies+: [lol what is going on]

-NOT EVEN FIVE MINUTES LATER. MORE LIKE A MINUTE LATER-

+Us:+ What's going on? Forgot something?
+My Dad+: I'm not suppose to fly out until tomorrow. I kinda goofed up.
+Us+: LOL WTF
+Puppies+: [lol what is going on]
